TopicTitle: Is it possible to plug an Xbox controller in and play KSP?

Articles.Content: Hello. This is just a quick question about KSP. Is it possible to plug an Xbox controller into your PC and play the game using the controller? Thanks, TCIS

Not using _just_ an XBox controller, but it works perfect for flight/docking/rovers.

Using my Xbox 360 controller almost every time I play,
